messages.content:
Dear Nayan,

Hello, my name is Daniel Block, and Iâm a fellow with the Henry Luce and Asia Foundations living in Delhi. I am a journalist, and Iâm currently doing a fact-finding investigation into two letters written by Anuj Loya about his father's death. I have some contacts that do investigations in the U.S., and theyâve offered to help me out (I am originally from New York).

I understand that you are friends with Anuj. If you have time, Iâd greatly appreciate it if I can speak to you/correspond with you for my research. You can feel free to message or call me here (on Facebook), over Whatsapp (+1 914-960-0230, Whatsapp is encrypted), or by regular cell phone (+91 8448-527008). You can also email me (dgatinsblock@gmail.com). I am not looking for a formal interview, and everything will stay between us.

Thanks,

Daniel
